channel.title: Interface on login (317)(Delta)

item.title: Interface on login (317)(Delta)
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

How do I get rid of this interface when I log in? I have commented in the whole section in my client.java (client side) and it still appears.

Ove6Q.png800×600

This is from client.java
